name: Behind The Screen (itch) (Hederlunden)
description:
IMPORTANT INFORMATION. PLEASE READ:

Press alt + enter to leave full screen mode. This will be important later in the game.

The game uses the unity HDRP which is quite performance heavy. If you have a bad computer, this game won't run well unfortunately. 

All the paintings and the end credit pictures were generated using Dall-e 2

Scroll wheel to change mouse sensitivity, R - Restart

Best experience in 1920x1080

Made for the WOWIE JAM 4.0

Theme: Collaboration with AI

In a really snowy october, you fall down into a hole under the snow. You land in a strange set of rooms, where your only goal is to escape. You also have an AI "friend" who will help you through the place by telling you what's on his side. Together you can both make it through. Or can you?

You trust me, right? :)
